Trigger.Name: TR_USR_CHILDQUOTA_WAITINGLISTPROCESS_DELETE_BUSINESSPROCESSINSTANCE
Trigger.Description: Used to delete the common business process records associated with this record.
Trigger.CreateTriggerSQL:
create trigger TR_USR_CHILDQUOTA_WAITINGLISTPROCESS_DELETE_BUSINESSPROCESSINSTANCE on dbo.USR_CHILDQUOTA_WAITINGLISTPROCESS after delete not for replication as begin
delete from dbo.BUSINESSPROCESSINSTANCE where BUSINESSPROCESSPARAMETERSETID in (select ID from deleted) and BUSINESSPROCESSCATALOGID = '967388a8-449b-40aa-be8c-3f9cab94e0df'; -- guid is the ID from business process spec - see ChildQuotaWaitingList.BusinessProcess.xml end
